00083 class HypreParMatrix : public Operator
00084 {
00085 private:
00087    hypre_ParCSRMatrix *A;
00088 
00090    hypre_ParCSRCommPkg *CommPkg;
00091 
00093    mutable HypreParVector *X, *Y;
00094 
00095 public:
00097    HypreParMatrix(hypre_ParCSRMatrix *a) : A(a)
00098    { X = Y = 0; CommPkg = 0; }
00100    HypreParMatrix(int size, int *row, SparseMatrix *diag);
00103    HypreParMatrix(int M, int N, int *row, int *col, SparseMatrix *diag);
00105    HypreParMatrix(int M, int N, int *row, int *col, SparseMatrix *diag,
00106                   SparseMatrix *offd, int *cmap);
00107 
00109    HypreParMatrix(int *row, int *col, SparseMatrix *a);
00110 
00112    HypreParMatrix(int M, int N, int *row, int *col, Table *diag);
00114    HypreParMatrix(MPI_Comm comm, int id, int np, int *row, int *col,
00115                   int *i_diag, int *j_diag, int *i_offd, int *j_offd,
00116                   int *cmap, int cmap_size);
00117 
00118    // hypre's communication package object
00119    void SetCommPkg(hypre_ParCSRCommPkg *comm_pkg);
00120    void CheckCommPkg();
00121    void DestroyCommPkg();
00122 
00124    operator hypre_ParCSRMatrix*();
00126    operator HYPRE_ParCSRMatrix();
00128    hypre_ParCSRMatrix* StealData();
00129 
00131    inline int NNZ() { return A->num_nonzeros; }
00133    inline int * RowPart() { return A->row_starts; }
00135    inline int * ColPart() { return A->col_starts; }
00137    inline int M() { return A -> global_num_rows; }
00139    inline int N() { return A -> global_num_cols; }
00140 
00142    HypreParMatrix * Transpose();
00143 
00145    int GetNumRows() const
00146    { return hypre_CSRMatrixNumRows(hypre_ParCSRMatrixDiag(A)); }
00147 
00148    int GetGlobalNumRows() const { return hypre_ParCSRMatrixGlobalNumRows(A); }
00149 
00150    int GetGlobalNumCols() const { return hypre_ParCSRMatrixGlobalNumCols(A); }
00151 
00152    int *GetRowStarts() const { return hypre_ParCSRMatrixRowStarts(A); }
00153 
00154    int *GetColStarts() const { return hypre_ParCSRMatrixColStarts(A); }
00155 
00157    int Mult(HypreParVector &x, HypreParVector &y,
00158             double alpha = 1.0, double beta = 0.0);
00160    int Mult(HYPRE_ParVector x, HYPRE_ParVector y,
00161             double alpha = 1.0, double beta = 0.0);
00163    int MultTranspose(HypreParVector &x, HypreParVector &y,
00164                      double alpha = 1.0, double beta = 0.0);
00165 
00166    virtual void Mult(const Vector &x, Vector &y) const;
00167    virtual void MultTranspose(const Vector &x, Vector &y) const;
00168 
00170    void Print(const char *fname, int offi = 0, int offj = 0);
00172    void Read(const char *fname);
00173 
00175    virtual ~HypreParMatrix();
00176 };

00197

00202 
00204    virtual operator HYPRE_Solver() const = 0;
00205 
00207    virtual HYPRE_PtrToParSolverFcn SetupFcn() const = 0;
00209    virtual HYPRE_PtrToParSolverFcn SolveFcn() const = 0;
00210 
00212    virtual void Mult(const HypreParVector &b, HypreParVector &x) const;
00213    virtual void Mult(const Vector &b, Vector &x) const;
00214 
00215    virtual ~HypreSolver();
00216 };

00235 
00237    void SetZeroInintialIterate() { use_zero_initial_iterate = 1; }
00238
